page.title: 03THE 'ARTS' IN FALMOUTH
page.content: Arts mean music,poetry,painting,pottery, sculpture and dance.You will find all of these arts in Falmouth.There is the library in which you will find some arts, there is also the 'Falmouth School of Arts' These days you will find 'arts' on the streets like buskers and Breakdancers.The street theatre people usually perform by the Co-op or the Cinema.At the Arts theatre you will find plays and dancing at the Princess Pavillion there is a band and they do plays.You can hear music in public houses. At the cinema you will find street theatre,plays,musicals and films.
